channel.title: Jcenter on Crushing C.O.D.E
channel.description: Recent content in Jcenter on Crushing C.O.D.E

item.title: Guide to publishing your Android Library via Jcenter/Bintray
item.description: Developers are a different kind of people altogether. They tend to be lazy but strive to be super efficient at the same time. A lot of this can be seen in the Android world where a certain library pops up everyday to solve a specific problem or to make the complex processes simpler. I have a certain knack for re-using code blocks just to avoid repeative tasks and to facilitate this I usually end up converting those codeblocks into an android library.
